camzup.core.CurveEntity2

Packages that use CurveEntity2 
Package Description
camzup.core  
camzup.pfriendly  

  • Uses of CurveEntity2 in camzup.core

    Methods in camzup.core that return CurveEntity2 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.append​(Curve2 curve)
    Appends a curve to this curve entity.
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.appendAll​(Curve2... app)
    Appends a list of curves to this curve entity.
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.appendAll​(java.util.Collection<Curve2> app)
    Appends a collection of curves to this curve entity.
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.consumeTransform()
    Transforms all curves in this curve entity by its transform, then resets the entity's transform to the identity.
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.flipX()
    Flips the curve horizontally.
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.flipY()
    Flips the curve vertically.
    static CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.fromMeshEntity​(MeshEntity2 me, CurveEntity2 target)
    Creates a curve entity from a mesh entity.
    static CurveEntity2 ParserSvg.load​(java.lang.String fileName)
    Given a file path, parses an SVG and returns a curve entity.
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.reframe()
    Centers and rescales all curves in the curve entity about a shared origin by calculating their dimensions, subtracting the center point, and scaling by the maximum dimension.
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.relocateKnot​(int curveIndex, int knotIndex, Vec2 global, Vec2 local)  
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.reset()
    Resets the curve entity to an initial state.
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.scaleBy​(float scalar)
    Scales the entity by a scalar.
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.scaleBy​(Vec2 scalar)
    Scales the entity by a non-uniform scalar.
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.scaleTo​(float scalar)
    Scales the entity to a uniform size.
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.scaleTo​(Vec2 scalar)
    Scales the entity to a non-uniform size.
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.scaleTo​(Vec2 scalar, float step)
    Eases the entity to a scale by a step over time.
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.setKnotCoord​(int curveIndex, int knotIndex, Vec2 global, Vec2 local)
    Sets the coordinate of a knot for a given curve at an index.
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.setKnotForeHandle​(int curveIndex, int knotIndex, Vec2 global, Vec2 local)
    Sets the fore handle of a knot for a given curve at an index.
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.setKnotRearHandle​(int curveIndex, int knotIndex, Vec2 global, Vec2 local)
    Sets the rear handle of a knot for a given curve at an index.
    CurveEntity2 CurveEntity2.toOrigin()
    Centers all curves in the curve entity about a shared origin by calculating their dimensions then subtracting the center point.

    Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] for a curve in the entity, returning a coordinate on the curve and a tangent.
